name: Ley Line Disorder: High Efficiency Supply - Pneuma
description:
When you Switch Characters: This action is considered a Fast Action and not a Combat Action.
End Phase: The Pneuma Energy of the character to which this is attached is replenished, and that character changes to be in the "Pneuma State."
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you Switch Characters:</color> This action is considered a $[K2] and not a $[K1].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> The Pneuma Energy of the character to which this is attached is replenished, and that character changes to be in the "Pneuma State."
